# chainguard_image_repos (Data Source)

Lookup multiple image repositories with optional filtering. Returns zero or more repositories.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) Filter repositories by name (supports partial matching).
- `parent_id` (String) Filter repositories by parent group UIDP.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier for the data source.
- `items` (Attributes List) List of image repositories matching the filter criteria. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `active_tags` (List of String) List of active tags for this repo.
- `aliases` (List of String) Known aliases for a given image.
- `bundles` (List of String) List of bundles associated with this repo (a-z freeform keywords for sales purposes).
- `id` (String) The UIDP of this repo.
- `name` (String) The name of this repo.
- `readme` (String) The README for this repo.
- `sync_config` (Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--sync_config))
- `tier` (String) Image tier associated with this repo.

<a id="nestedatt--items--sync_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.sync_config`

Read-Only:

- `amazon` (String)
- `apko_overlay` (String)
- `azure` (String)
- `expiration` (String)
- `google` (String)
- `grace_period` (Boolean)
- `source` (String)
- `unique_tags` (Boolean)
